thread.title: Wells Fargo Investigated by CFPB over Student Loan Servicing
thread.title_full: Wells Fargo Investigated by CFPB over Student Loan Servicing - WSJ

author: AnnaMaria Andriotis
title: Wells Fargo Investigated by CFPB over Student Loan Servicing
text:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is investigating Wells Fargo & Co. over its student loan servicing practices, according to people familiar with the matter.
The investigation has been under way since at least late last year, the people familiar said, and began following a routine examination of the San Francisco-based bank. It is unclear what servicing issues the bureau has been probing and whether the inquiry will lead... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
